scripts.anchor-deploy:init: npm run anchor-buffer-delete && npm run anchor-buffer-create && solana program-v4 deploy ./target/deploy/owhership_nft.so --program-keypair ./target/deploy/owhership_nft-keypair.json --buffer ./solana/buffer-owhership_nft-deploy-keypair.json
scripts.anchor-buffer-delete: BUFFER_ADDR=$(solana address -k ./solana/buffer-owhership_nft-deploy-keypair.json 2>/dev/null) && if [ -n "$BUFFER_ADDR" ]; then solana program-v4 close $BUFFER_ADDR --authority ./solana/id.json || true; fi && rm -f ./solana/buffer-owhership_nft-deploy-keypair.json
